Producer: Robin Gurland, Keanu Reeves, Gee Malik Linton
Production Co: Movie Trailer House, Company Films, PalmStar Media, Fortitude International , Emmett/Furla/Oasis Films
Synopsis: While investigating the death of his partner, a detective (Keanu Reeves) uncovers police corruption and a dangerous secret involving a young woman (Ana de Armas).
Title: Exposed
